creator: yl@bee-ware.net
text:
This patch allows the use of client certificate extensions values (by OID) in
the SSLRequire directive.

This functionnality is available in the 2.2.* branch and hasn't been backported
in the 2.0.*.

This patch is therefore a port of what is done in httpd-2.2.6, with the 2.0
"API", plus a bugfix (cf. #44073).

creator: yl@bee-ware.net
text:
Created attachment 21271
SSL client certificate extensions requirements patch

Created attachment 21272
SSL client certificate extensions requirements patch without debug trace

Oups, remaining debug trace removed.
creator: yl@bee-ware.net

text:
Thanks for submitting the patch, but backports of existing features don't need
to be tracked in bugzilla, please bring this up on dev@httpd for discussion.
creator: jorton@redhat.com
